meta.title: Home - Stafford Municipal School District

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme2

div.p: searched for

div.class: fsElement fsResourceElement fsSlideshow hero-slideshow fsSlideshowHorizontal fsStatePlaying

video.div: Your web browser does not support the <video> tag.
Your web browser does not support the <video> tag.

img.alt: dr bostic in front of the stafford sign showing thumbs up

figcaption.p: I've never had a parent ask for second best for their child. We're here to provide YOUR family the BEST experience. Become a Spartan!
The Robotics Program is operated under the George Foundation Grant. The program launched School Year 2015-2016 and going strong.
Technology integration in daily instruction is an integral part at Stafford MSD for student achievement and progress.

div.p: Stafford

Hidden between the metropolis of Houston and the growing East Fort Bend County, Stafford Municipal School District maintains its small-school environment while addressing the educational needs of the 21st century. Whether you excel in academics, arts, robotics or athletics, we have an experience for you that will enhance your future!

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsList discover-yourself fsThumbnailRectangle fsThumbnailFull fsItemCount_6

div.p: Yourself here

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-3 fsTag-5 fsTag-8 fsTag-25 fsTag-26 fsTag-34

div.p: Visit our new Stafford Learns website for all of your online learning needs. Stafford Learns

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-3 fsTag-5 fsTag-25 fsTag-27 fsTag-34

div.p: SMSD is the proud recipient of more then $300,000 in grants to support its highly popular robotics program.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-3 fsTag-8 fsTag-26 fsTag-27 fsTag-34

div.p: Technology accelerates and deepens learning opportunities. It promotes anytime, anywhere learning and prepares students for the future.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-3 fsTag-5 fsTag-8 fsTag-25 fsTag-26 fsTag-27 fsTag-34

div.a: College & Career Ready (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: Our graduates know that achieving the “American Dream” requires a desire to keep learning beyond high school. Follow our alumni who are finding success in two- and four-year colleges – without needing remedial courses. Our students are college and career ready.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-3 fsTag-8 fsTag-25 fsTag-26 fsTag-27 fsTag-34

div.a: Family & Student Engagement (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: The number one reason students work hard is to make their family proud. Families who show an interest and involvement in a child’s learning are powerful motivators. You don’t have to have the answers. Ask your child to teach you what they are learning. Access our family resources for more tips and tools to support children and learning.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-3 fsTag-8 fsTag-25 fsTag-26 fsTag-27 fsTag-34

div.title: young boy working on technology education tool

img.alt: young boy working on technology education tool

div.p: Science, technology, engineering, and math skills prepare students for high-demand careers. We like to call it “STEM to Earn.”

img.alt: stephen f. austin state university logo
texas a&M university corpus christi logo

div.p: Of Stafford

div.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsGrid fsThumbnailRectangle fsThumbnailFull fsItemCount_3

div.p: SMSD has planned another Town Hall meeting, scheduled for Thursday, April 30th, 6:30 P.M.

article.a: Read More about SMSD Virtual Town Hall

div.p: Stafford MSD will continue with online instruction and remote operations, at minimum, until May 4, 2020, at which time we will reassess. All SMSD district and campus buildings and facilities will remain closed to the public during this time.

article.a: Read More about SMSD Covid-19 Update

div.a: SMSD Curb-side Meal Service (opens in new window/tab)

div.p: The SMSD curbside "Grab N Go" meal service has been temporarily suspended until further notice. Click for more information.

article.a: Read More about SMSD Curb-side Meal Service (opens in new window/tab)

div.div: There are no resources or collections to display

Welcome to Stafford Municipal School District #StaffordProud

Stafford High School Marching Band Scores All 1s

div.a: Stafford High School Marching Band Scores All 1s

div.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsGrid fsThumbnailRectangle fsThumbnailFull fsItemCount_3

div.title: jalen pitre playing football for baylor

img.alt: jalen pitre playing football for baylor

div.p: “It's very exciting - it couldn't have played out better for my family and I,” Pitre said. “I will have a chance to play 10 minutes from my house.”

div.title: justin standing on the baseball field at world series 2019

img.alt: justin standing on the baseball field at world series 2019

div.p: "In what he described as a 'dream come true', Stafford MSD Class of 2008 graduate Justin Montez is the second-most important Justin in the Houston Astros organization."

div.title: grein in full U.S. army uniform

img.alt: grein in full U.S. army uniform

div.p: "My career started while I was in Stafford High school, and I am proud to be continuing my lifelong service more than 25 years later. "

article.a: Read More about Michael Scott Grein

div.p: Contact Us

Contact us at 281-261-9200 with any questions!
If you are ready to become a Spartan,

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

div.p: Stafford MSD will continue to provide online learning for all students for the 2019-2020 academic calendar year until May 22, 2020, to remain in compliance with the State's response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Additionally, SMSD will continue to provide academic packet pick up and curbside meal distribution through the end of the year. Please be reminded the curbside meal service has been suspended and will resume Monday, April 27, 2020. Stay tuned for Information regarding SMSD summer programs.
Visit our Virtual Learning Website for online learning resources
